title: Students plan gun control protests after Parkland shooting
text:
Students plan gun control protests after Parkland shooting 5:11pm GMT - 01:20 
Stunned by the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history, students are mobilizing across the country to organize rallies and a national walkout in support of stronger gun laws, challenging politicians they say have failed to protect them. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Stunned by the deadliest high school shooting in U.S. history, students are mobilizing across the country to organize rallies and a national walkout in support of stronger gun laws, challenging politicians they say have failed to protect them.
